Title: Relates to increasing penalties for aggravated unlicensed operation of motor vehicle in second and first degrees; in certain cases
Summary: Increases penalties for aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle in the second and first degrees.
LawCode: Amd ยง511, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing the penalties for aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle in the second and first degrees in certain cases
